attributes.action: recommend Bruce Forsyth for a Knighthood
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Brucie is a national institution.  There cannot be anyone from the world of showbiz more deserving of having this honour bestowed.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
